document.docAuthor: Gadallah, Neveen S., Ghahari, Hassan & Peris-Felipo, Francisco Javier
document.masterDocTitle: Catalogue of the Iranian Microgastrinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Catalogue of the Iranian Microgastrinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution in Iran .
Qazvin (Ghahari et al. 2011 b).

Host records. This species has been reported from a large number of lepidopterous hosts (
Shenefelt 1972
;
Yu et al. 2012
). In Europe, it has been reported from
Odontoptera bidentata
,
Colotois pennaria
(
Fahringer 1936
;
Yu et al. 2012
),
Phigalia pilosaria
(
Fahringer 1936
;
Tobias 1986
), In Japan from
Phigalia simosaria (
Watanabe 1937
)
. It has been reported as a common gregarious parasitoid of a wide range of hosts mostly of the family Geometridae ,
Biston betularia
,
B. strataria
,
Lycia hirtaria
,
Hypomecis punctinalis
,
Campaea margaritata
,
Ennomos quercinaria
,
Odontopera bidentata , Seleniadentaria
,
S. lunularia
. It has been also bred from
Hypomecis roboraria
,
Brachionycha sphinx
,
Diloba caeruleocephala
,
Phyllororycter oxyacanthae
,
Cerura vinula , Poecilocampa populi
(
Nixon 1974
;
Yu et al. 2012
). Yu et al. reported it also from
Acrolyta marginata
,
A. pseudonens
,
Acronicta auricoma
,
Aglais urticae
,
Agrotis segetum
,
Aletia litoralis
,
Anacampsis populella
,
Angerona prunaria
,
Aphantopus hyperantus
,
Aporia crataegi
,
Arctia caja
,
Autographa gamma
,
Baryscapus galactopus
,
Bathythrix aerea
,
Caradrina morpheus
,
Carcharodus alceae
,
Catolaccus ater
,
Catocala promissa
,
C. sponsa
,
C. vinula
,

,

,

,
C. punctaria
,

,

,

,

,

,
